name: Cruz de los Andes

reviews.text: If you're planning an early arrival to La Paz -- perhaps after the bus ride from h.e.double.hockey.sticks. on the unpaved roads from Uyuni -- this is a great choice in the center of La Paz's most tourist-friendly area, blocks from the Witches' Market.
reviews.title: Clean, comfortable, great breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You'll be allowed to check in at 7 or 8 AM and -- since the hotel is located on a quiet side street -- be able to sleep away the morning hours before exploring the surrounding markets. Beds are comfortable, showers are hot, and rooms are decorated with interesting murals.
reviews.title: Stayed here twice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: WiFi service is available throughout the hotel, but it is very slow (dial-up speeds) and erratic. This is common for Bolivia, but could probably be improved given that internet cafes in Bolivia seem to have faster speeds.
reviews.title: Nice hotel in La Paz

reviews.text: Breakfast is really nice: fresh crusty bread, fruit, cereal, granola, yogurt and made-to-order eggs. Tea, coffee and juice are available.
reviews.title: Rent a heater!

reviews.text: One star is taken off for an in-house travel agency that -- while very friendly and competent -- seems to be charging more for the same buses and shuttles than independent travel agencies in the surrounding streets. Before you buy that shuttle ticket to Copacabana or Peru, ask around for prices at other travel agencies, and then negotiate with the hotel's agency.
reviews.title: Hilarious themed floors, quiet street close to centre

reviews.text: We were there for a short term stay.
reviews.title: won't be back

reviews.text: * Breakfast is free - toast/fruit/yogart.
reviews.title: reasonable and convenient hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: * The rooms were basic. I got bite (see picture) not sure what kind of bugs :(
reviews.title: very good hostel

reviews.text: * There is internet. Signal was stable.
reviews.title: Absolutely great place to stay!

reviews.text: * Location is safe and quite.
reviews.title: A lovely respite in the middle of La Paz

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here upon arrival in La Paz and then after our Salt Flat tour. It feels more like a hotel than a hostel - in a good way. We stayed in 3 different rooms (we moved from the top floor -floor 5 - as I was feeling altitude sick and five flights of stairs wasn't helping!), all of which were very clean and had warm showers. Breakfasts were really good - fresh, good quality bread, eggs available on request.
reviews.title: Great value - good location for sightseeing

reviews.text: Staff were very friendly and helpful - one criticism is that they had no record of our reservation for the second stay there - luckily they had a free room. No problems with the laundry service. Coca tea is on the house. There's a basic pool table and some decent computers in the basement.
reviews.title: Great Hostel with Friendly Staff

reviews.text: The location is pretty good - very near the witches market and lots of restaurants, shops etc.
reviews.title: Really great

reviews.text: The paintings of beaches etc on the walls are imaginative and a nice touch. Overall, great value and recommended for exploring La Paz.
reviews.title: Pretty good for the price

reviews.text: We stayed at this hostel twice. The first time for only 2 days and the second time for 6 days. This hostel was great. The rooms are nice, good beds. Rooms were cleaned every day with fresh towels. They also offer free breakfast. This hostel is well located only 10 minutes downhill to all the tourist shopping and San Francisco main square. The staff is excellent, very welcoming and helpful There is also a good travel agency right in this hotel. We booked several plane flights and train tickets through them. I would stay here again and would highly recommend it.
reviews.title: Great breakfast and comfy rooms.

reviews.text: The rooms are very beautifully decorated and quite big, beds are comfy but the bathrooms a little dated and a bit smelly.
reviews.title: Decent place to stay whilst in La Paz!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location is fairly decent, close to most things you'd want to visit and not a million miles from the bus station.
reviews.title: Ideal place to stay in La Paz

reviews.text: Breakfast is ok and included, decent value for money so highly recommended to those backpacking on a budget.
reviews.title: A real gem of a place with probably the best showers in La Paz!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Cruz de los Andes is a great place to stay if you're in La Paz.. it's located quite close to the markets and a short walk from the Four Corners area. The staff are lovely and welcoming. The rooms are spacious and clean, very homely. They are cleaned daily and you are given fresh towels. Shower was amazing! The breakfast was great with fresh fruit, cereals, bread, coffee, tea, hot chocolate, etc. Also have to mention that the decor of this place is pretty!
reviews.title: Great location and breakfast
Great place to stay in La Paz
reviews.text: The only negative thing I can say about this place perhaps has to do with the location of our room within the building (203). In the mornings we were awoken by an extremely loud garage roller door and I'm not sure if there is construction happening on the upper floors but there was also consistent banging. One night we were also kept up until 1:30am by a group of people playing a game of pool and playing music in the downstairs area. Perhaps a quiet time curfew wouldn't hurt, if there isn't already one in place. Even with the above mentioned, still not enough reason to not highly recommend this place! We still rate it excellent!

aka: Cruz De Los Andes Hotel La Paz
description: All room have private bathrooms,tv cable,phones,breakfast buffet included in the price,garaje,front desk is open 24 hrs, internet is available on the lounge.
